name: DogvsCat
description:

There was an error on my pc that prevent me to update it to itchio

How To Play (Mouse Only or Touch)
Give your dog and cat its food and drive them to his house becaurfull with each other , water and fire.

Select the Dog Icon or the Cat Icon , and drive them to its food (Point with the Mouse to where you need you need them to go )   and then back to its home.

PD :  You only  use your Only Mouse or touch device,  Thanks MashyZ for the advice
